data.title: Broussard's Mortuary – Since 1889
data.text:
Betty Lou Young Spivey

Betty Lou Young Spivey, 85, of Village Mills, died Friday, August 30, 2024. A gathering of Mrs. Spivey’s family and friends will begin 10:00 a.m. with her funeral service at 11:00 a.m., Monday, September 9, 2024, at Broussard’s, 1605 North Major Drive, Beaumont. Her interment will follow at Forest Lawn Memorial Park, Beaumont.

Read More

Shirley Dell Bergeron

Shirley Dell Bergeron, 87, died Wednesday, August 28, 2024. She was born August 22, 1937, in Orange, to Grace Bilbo Dudley and Samuel Dudley. Dell always enjoyed going to estate and garage sales with her friends, and playing slot machines. She enjoyed helping others and often volunteered at her church and at local charities. Her friends brought richness to her life. They shared joy through garage sale finds, casino wins (and losses), and MUCH laughter. Dell loved the Lord and had a gift of hospitality and her home was a place where people were always welcomed and fed well. Survivors include her children, Karen Cravy, and her husband, Ricky, Sharon Ross and her husband, Leslie, Daryl Lafitte, and his wife, Cheryl; grandchildren, Dean Cravy, and his wife, Heather, Jack Cravy and his wife, Erica, Zach Cravy, Hannah Massa, and her husband, Zack, Bryce Lafitte, Brody Lafitte, and his wife, Briana, […]

Jeannie Ross Clingaman

Jeannie Ross Clingaman, 73, of Silsbee, died on Wednesday, August 28, 2024. She was born on September 20, 1950, in Newton, to Leva Smith Ross and H.C. “Bo” Ross. Survivors include her sons, Jon Ken Clingaman and his wife, Gayle, of Lufkin; and Jeffrey Clingaman, Sr. and his fiancée, Knicole Childs, of Silsbee; grandchildren, Piper Clingaman, Miller Clingaman, and Jeffrey Clingaman, Jr.; siblings, Delbert Earl Ross and his wife, Linda, of Woodville; and DeRisa Ross Pullen and her husband, Doug, of Pinewood; nieces and nephews, Darron Ross of Round Rock; Dorie Stafford and her husband, Lonnie, of Lumberton; Michael Ross Jones and his wife, Rosanna, of Holliston, Massachusetts; Matthew Rhame and his wife, Rachel, of Sheridan, Montana; and Megan Keys, of Williamstown, Vermont; and numerous great nieces and nephews. Jeannie is preceded in death by her parents. Jeannie was a 1969 Silsbee High School graduate and went on to attend […]
